text: Winnie-the-Pooh and a Busy Day () is a 1972 Soviet animated movie directed by Fyodor Khitruk and Gennady Sokolsky.ВИННИ-ПУХ И ДЕНЬ ЗАБОТ (1972)Винни Пух и день забот (1972) ==Actors== * Vladimir Osenev as the narrator * Yevgeny Leonov as Winnie-the-Pooh * Iya Savvina as Piglet * Erast Garin as Eeyore == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 movies Category:1970s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: Winnie-the-Pooh and a Busy Day
